item.title: 2021#16 Readings
item.description: This past week I’ve been on holidays in Cordoba. I put on 2.5kg in 4 days. Recommended.

item.title: Generative iris

item.title: 2019#10 Readings of the week
item.description: Software engineering, psychology, generative art. Expect a similar wide range in the future as well. You can check all my weekly readings by checking the [tag here](https://www.mostlymaths.net/search/label/ReadingsOfTheWeek, Readings) . You can also get these as a weekly newsletter by subscribing here.

item.title: Using Processing from Scala
item.description: I had always wanted to play with Processing (after leafing through The Processing HandbookÂ and Visualizing Data some years ago). My general dislike for Java or the JVM made me just play a short amount of time with processing.js something around 2011 (there was a native processing.js application for iOS, I used it for a while on my iPad and iPod Touch).
